actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the payment of private legal expenses for Michael Kinsella, a Senate employee, out of the contingent fund of the Senate.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to pay out of the Senate's contingent fund the legal expenses incurred by Michael Kinsella for private representation with respect to official actions and responsibilities before the grand jury in United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the payment of private legal expenses for Michael Kinsella, a Senate employee, out of the contingent fund of the Senate.
